tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE sales_forecast (
    id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    date DATE,
    product_id INT,
    quantity_sold INT,
    unit_price DECIMAL,
    market_demand DECIMAL
);

CREATE TABLE sales_forecast (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    product_id INT,
    sales_date DATE,
    quantity_sold INT,
    revenue DECIMAL(10, 2)
);

CREATE TABLE sales_predictions (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    product_id INT,
    prediction_date DATE,
    predicted_quantity INT,
    predicted_revenue DECIMAL(10, 2)
);
